title: Is Final Fantasy VII Remake Coming to PC? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 04.10.20
description:
Blessing and Greg talk about Final Fantasy VII Remake possibly coming to PC. 
 
Time Stamps - 
 00:04:45 - I’ve literally never played a Final Fantasy game, but the FOMO for Final Fantasy VII remake is starting to get to me. Should I just get it? I play all different kinds of games, and I’m always down to try something new. Also, is there any similar game you could compare it to so I could know what the gameplay is like? - Best Friends Q:Aidan Dean
00:10:23 - Housekeeping
Greg’s in the Gamers vs. Cancer tournament today. Greg, what is that? kindafunny.com/mizzou
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mohammed Mohammed, Al Tribesman, Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:15:20 - A New Final Fantasy 7 Remake Trailer Hints at PC Release - Jordan Oloman @ IGN
00:26:35 - Final Fantasy 14’s next patch is delayed - Rebekah Valentine @ GIBiz
00:30:30 - Cyberpunk 2077’s Next-Gen version is coming sometime after launch - Jordan Gerblick @ GamesRadar
00:39:42 - New World, Amazon's Upcoming MMO, has been Delayed to August - Matt Kim @ IGN
00:38:50 - Out today
Reader mail   -
00:43:08 - When there is a game that you are really looking forward to playing, how do you set yourself up so that you enjoy it fully? - Alex aka Coync
00:48:12 -  - jonbx32
00:53:35 - Squad Up: Kayla (PS4) - beruset
00:54:00 - You‘re Wrong
Next Week’s Hosts:
MONDAY: Blessing and Tim
TUESDAY: Blessing and Imran
WEDNESDAY: Greg and Gary
THURSDAY: Greg and Blessing
FRIDAY: Blessing and Greg
